text: Mba gumgi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgara kav vov, wari vhɨzgi. Mbe kha nuianan kav, mbe mba Fhe Bakɨme ndir zav mbe suaŋgi bigir vhuuiŋ, mbe nta ndigi fhuvara. Mbe khaŋ muuŋgi, mbe samra thɨga mba bigi gari, nta samra ki fara muuŋgim, mbe nta nzuav ndikndigi. Mbe vhɨra khueŋ bun suangen mbergi fhuvara. Mbe khueŋ nzuai, “Nza kha nuianan kav, nza harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi fara muuŋgi. Nza zegap, tuga tɨvaneŋra kha nuianan ki.”
